statements.select: /* UserDac.SelectUserExistYn */ SELECT DECODE(COUNT(USER_ID),0,'N','Y')AS "ExistYn" FROM TN_USER WHERE USER_ID = #UserId#

/* UserDac.SelectUser */ SELECT USER_ID AS "UserId" FROM TN_USER WHERE USER_ID = ( SELECT USER_ID
FROM TN_INDVDL_USER
FROM TN_ENTRPRS_USER
FROM TN_INSTT_USER
FROM TN_SIGNGU_USER
WHERE USER_NM = #UserNm# AND EMAIL_ADRES = #EmailAdres#
WHERE USER_ID = #UserId# AND EMAIL_ADRES = #EmailAdres#
AND PASSWORD_HINT_SE_CODE = #PasswordHintSeCode# AND PASSWORD_HINT_CNSR = #PasswordHintCnsr#
)
statements.insert: /* UserDac.InsertUser */ INSERT INTO TN_USER ( USER_ID ,USER_SE_CODE ,PASSWORD ,PASSWORD_INITL_AT ,PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT ) VALUES ( #UserId# ,#UserSeCode# ,#Password# ,#PasswordInitlAt# ,SYSDATE )
